main event: A civilian observed a disc-shaped object the size of a grapefruit in Pecos, New Mexico, on 16 September 1957.
interesting points: The object was white with a yellow tint and left a very long dull blue vapor trail that disappeared instantly,The observation lasted only one second.,The sighting occurred on a clear night,The object was noted to have no sound,The report attributes the sighting to an astronomical meteor.
